meanings.sent1: She misrecorded the meeting time in her planner.
meanings.sent2: The secretary misrecorded the phone number in the database.
meanings.sent3: The misrecorded address led the delivery person to the wrong house.
meanings.sent4: His misrecorded memories played tricks on his mind.
meanings.sent5: The misrecorded instructions caused confusion among the team.

meanings.definition: To make an error in recording something.
meanings.sent1: He misrecorded the customer's order and had to apologize.
meanings.sent2: The student misrecorded the lecture notes and missed important information.
meanings.sent3: The misrecorded song lyrics made everyone laugh at the karaoke night.
meanings.sent4: Her misrecorded steps on the dance floor made her stumble.
meanings.sent5: The misrecorded measurements resulted in a failed baking attempt.
